實際入款遊戲幣為入款金額-手續費後之餘額進行換算。: Actual Wallet Amount = Deposit Amount - Handling Fee = Balance.(This balance needs to convert first, and the resulting number is the actual wallet amount.)
匯率可能隨時變動中，所有交易以本網站的匯率為準，打幣後交易期間若有變動，將以實際: The exchange rate may change at any time. All transactions are subject to the exchange rate of this website. If there is any change during the transaction period after the coin is issued, it will be allocated to the money at the exchange rate at the time of the actual coin deposit. Hence, it is recommended that you readjust the exchange rate information before depositing to ensure that you agree to the current exchange rate before depositing.
